thread.title: Tori Kelly, James Bay and Jess Glynne Added to 2015 MTV EMA Line-Up
thread.title_full: Tori Kelly, James Bay and Jess Glynne Added to 2015 MTV EMA Line-Up

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Tori Kelly, James Bay and Jess Glynne Added to 2015 MTV EMA Line-Up
text:
Comments The three acts join the likes of Pharrell Williams, Twenty One Pilots, Ellie Goulding and Jason Derulo to perform at the upcoming event scheduled for later this month. 
More acts have been added to the line-up of performers for the 2015 MTV Europe Music Awards. It's announced on Tuesday, October 13 that Tori Kelly , James Bay and Jess Glynne would be among those taking the stage at the event scheduled for later this month. Mark Ronson , Ashley Benson , Fifth Harmony , Martin Garrix and Shay Mitchell have all been confirmed to appear at the ceremony as presenters. The 2015 MTV EMAs will be broadcast live in the U.S. Sunday, October 25 on MTV at 8 P.M. ET/PT from the Mediolanum Forum in Milan, Italy. Taylor Swift leads the nominees with record-breaking nine nods including three for her collaboration with Kendrick Lamar , "Bad Blood".
